detail_desc: Hipster briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Rib-knit hat with a wide, foldover hem.
Hi-tops in cotton canvas with lacing at the front and rubber toe caps. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zip fly and a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with sewn-in creases.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a shirt and slipover in cotton. Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie or bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap. Fine-knit slipover with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Seersucker dress in a narrow cut at the top with a gentle flare to the hem. Elasticated top, narrow shoulder straps and a rounded hem.
Long, sleeveless dress in viscose jersey with frilled, elasticated shoulder straps, a double layer at the top and an elasticated seam under the bust.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, grosgrain button band with concealed buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Joggers in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
V-neck T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Fine-knit socks in soft chenille with elasticated tops.
Wide cropped top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with pleats front and back, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a top in cotton jersey and trousers in woven fabric. Long-sleeved top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a print motif on the front. Trousers with concealed, adjustable elastication and a press-stud at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbing at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend.
Socks in a soft, fine, fluffy knit containing glittery threads. Elasticated at the top.

Short, V-neck dress in cotton jersey with broderie anglaise. Covered buttons down the front, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, a seam at the waist and gently flared, lined skirt.

Playsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a deep V-neck, gently dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs. Wrapover top, elasticated seam at the waist with ties at the side and a second layer below the waist to form a wrapover peplum with a short flounce at the hem.
Long jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Chest pockets, patch pockets and slits at the sides of the hem. Unlined.
Reversible bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets at the front, and ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Dress in a woven cotton blend with broderie anglaise. Wide tie shoulder straps, a concealed zip in the side and seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps, a zip at the back and a seam at the waist.
Knee-length wrap dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, short, flounced sleeves and a seam at the waist with a tie belt. Unlined.
Leather belt. Width 2.3 cm.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves that finish at the elbows, and a smocked seam at the waist.
Long-sleeved blouse in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative seams at the top and an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Long T-shirt in slub jersey with a sequined motif on the front and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Fitted, double-layered dress in lace and mesh with long sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Contrasting colour lining dress with narrow shoulder straps.

Waist bag in woven fabric with imitation leather details. Two-way zip at the top, an outer compartment with a zip at the front and a zipped inner compartment. Adjustable waist strap with a metal fastener. Lined. Size approx. 4x15x28 cm.
Top in cotton jersey with cut-out sections on the shoulders, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with a drawstring at the top.

Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-shaped opening at the top and a collar with ties at the front. Pleat at the back, cuffs with a covered button, and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Blouse in an airy crêpe weave made from partly recycled polyester. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a V-neck opening with concealed buttons at the front and short, wide raglan sleeves. Lined front.
Shorts in a cotton weave with concealed, adjustable elastication and a button at the waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and a fake back pocket.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, narrow straps that can be wound and tied around the ankle, and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Long blouse in airy chiffon with embroidery and lace details. Buttons at the top, an opening at the front, short sleeves and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Joggers in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, and flap back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.

Pull-on trousers in washed cotton twill. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, low crotch and diagonal side pockets. Legs with shaping darts at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and satin linings and insoles.
Fitted, round-necked T-shirt in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with short slits at the hems.
Short off-the-shoulder dress in a patterned weave with elastication at the top, a smocked bodice and short sleeves.

Handbag accessory with a metal chain and carabiner hook, and an imitation leather pendant in the shape of a backpack. The backpack has a zip at the top, faux fur pompom and small, zipped outer compartment. Size approx. 3x7x9 cm.

Long dress in viscose twill with a grandad collar and button placket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs. Seam at the hips and a flared skirt that is slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Short, wide T-shirt in printed jersey.
Reversible sun hat in soft, cotton jersey with one patterned side and one side in a solid colour. Narrow ties under the chin. Width of brim 5 cm.
Short dress in jersey with short sleeves. a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom at the top. Lined.
Longer, fitted top in stretch cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and sewn-in creases down the front of the legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with embroidery, long, flared sleeves and a V-neck at the back with a horizontal tie at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Fine-knit liner socks designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have a ribbed section in the middle of the foot and elastication around the openings for optimum comfort.
Plastic smartphone case with a transparent back and coloured trims.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbed cuffs.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave. Detachable, padded hood with a soft pile lining, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap patch front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and press-studs at the sides of the hem. Pile lining.
Playsuit in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a low-cut back, gathered seam at the waist and short, wide legs.

Boxy-style top in sturdy cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and a decorative V-neck seam at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with decorative seams, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Glasses case in imitation leather with an imitation suede lining. Flap with a reinforced front and press-stud fastening. Size 6x16 cm.
Soft slippers with a motif, loop at the back and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Calf-length, fitted skirt in jacquard-patterned jersey. High waist with covered elastication, and a slit at the back. Unlined.
Vest top in airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a low neckline front and back.
Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit top in soft wool jersey with long sleeves, press-studs at the shoulders and a gently rounded hem.
Hat in a soft, textured knit with a small imitation leather appliqué at the front and a ribbed hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders.
